column6: This is an exceptionally private suite with private access and a driveway located in City Place/Uptown East in the most convenient area of Dallas. Greenville, Henderson, Uptown, Downtown, Deep Ellum, and even Oak Cliff are all fast and easy to reach by Uber or City Place DART. \nEvery comfort and convenience was thought out by the previous owner to make for an easy and relaxing stay. We want each guest to be a repeat client with great experiences who enjoyed their visit. \nTry us out today!
column9: The Capitol Suite at City Place
